body: This shawl of delicate lace can be activated once per day to grant the benefits of the fins to feet spell, transforming the wearer's lower fins or appendages into feet whenever he is on dry land—unless dismissed, this effect lasts for 5 hours.
name: Seafoam Shawl
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Wondrous Items/Shoulders/Shoulders Slot Wondrous Items/Seafoam Shawl
